name: Pipes connect!
description:
Pipes connect is an addictive free puzzle game! Your goal is to eliminate monsters by connecting pipelines.

Free play through hundreds of levels, Pipe Connect! gameplay ranges from simple and relaxed, to challenging and frenetic, and everywhere in between. How you play is up to you. So, give Pipes Connect! a try, and experience "mind like water"!

Different monsters have different skills. Watch out your HP, don’t let monsters hit them. Challenge yourself to be a pipe master, see how many monsters you can kill and how many blocks you can clean up.

Pipes Connect is an awesome connect the pipeline plumber game for smartphones and tablets. In plumber game you have to connect all the pipes! Rotate the tiles with the pieces of the pipeline in the grid.

This cool plumber game includes many different levels divided across various plumber pipeline worlds. Follow the pipeline to get to the next level! Can you fix the plumbing and solve each level on time?

【How to play】
- Rotate the pipes by touching them and connect them as flow lines
- Eliminate monsters which stick on pipes by clearing connected pipe flow
- Eliminate monster before they drop down to the bottom of the screen.
- The more you kill the more scores you will get, or they will hit your HP.

【Key Features】
-Infinite levels
-More new monsters will be on board when you level up
-New playing for block puzzle
-No time limited and no network needed
-Google play supported and challenge with your friends
-Save anytime, no need to worry about missing progress

Pipes connect is a new pipes puzzles and pipe connecting games. It is a free, simple but challenging and addicting pipe puzzle game!

Find out how much fun could be delivered by pipes!
